nodes.text: Kaminoan Armorsmiths Ltd. was a company based on Kamino.

With help from Jango Fett, they designed the Phase I clone trooper armor. It proved to be the company's largest success. The company developed variants on the Phase I armor, such as the Katarn-class commando armor and the ARC trooper armor. They also improved upon on the Phase I variant by developing the Phase II clone trooper armor, the more advanced successor of the former.
